price: 91. Tada jis atsigręžė į jų aliha (dievus) ir tarė: „Argi jūs nevalgysite (to, kas siūloma jums)?“
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
